item.title: Flashing Asus-WRT Merlin by XVortex on NetGear NightHawk R7000
item.description: Note: There are many ways to achieve this and in this tutorial I follow two flash method. Preparation: This guide assumes you are on stock firmware. If you are already on DD WRT or Tomato, ignore step 2 of procedure. Doesn’t matter whether you are on Windows, Linux or Mac. Everything happens in browser Make sure you are connected to the router over one of WAN ports It doesn’t matter which firmware version you are currently on.
